title: SAEL set to close $1 billion fundraise from foreign, domestic investors
description: SAEL Ltd, a company converting agricultural waste into energy, is reportedly in the final stages of securing a $1 billion fundraise from US and European investors. The US International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) and Norfund, a Norwegian government-owned fund, are expected to participate.
